webcrawler

Class WebCrawlerConfigurationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcrawler.WebCrawlerConfigurationFactory

  • public class WebCrawlerConfigurationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class in order to manage injection of the various classes used as part of the crawler
    Author:
    Peter Hayes, Iain Ritchie
